actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 38, United States Code, to permit children who are eligible for educational assistance under such chapter to pursue a program of education under such chapter exclusively by correspondence.

summary.text: Permits children who are eligible for educational assistance under programs of the Veterans' Administration to pursue a program of education exclusively by correspondence. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1734(b)).

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 38, United States Code, to permit children who are eligible for educational assistance under such chapter to pursue a program of education under such chapter exclusively by correspondence.
